00630 //  Main function 
00631 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00632 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00633 {
00634         glutInit(&argc, argv);
00635         glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_DEPTH | GLUT_DOUBLE | GLUT_RGBA);
00636         glutInitWindowPosition(0,0);
00637         glutInitWindowSize(1000,1000 );
00638         glutCreateWindow("Gravity Ball");
00639 
00640         myinit();
00641 
00642 
00643 
00644         glutIgnoreKeyRepeat(1);
00645         glutSpecialFunc(movementKeys);
00646         glutSpecialUpFunc(releaseKey);
00647         glutKeyboardUpFunc (releaseKeys);
00648         glutKeyboardFunc(keys);
00649 
00650         glutDisplayFunc(Display);
00651         glutIdleFunc(Display);
00652         glutMouseFunc(Mouse);
00653         
00654         // ONLY USE IF REQUIRE MOUSE MOVEMENT
00655         //glutPassiveMotionFunc(mouseMove);
00656         //ShowCursor(FALSE);
00657 
00658         glutReshapeFunc(reshape);
00659         glutMainLoop();
00660         return(0);
00661 }

00663 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00664 //  Initialize Settings
00665 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00666 void myinit()
00667 {
00668         // set background (sky colour)
00669         glClearColor(97.0/255.0, 140.0/255.0, 185.0/255.0, 1.0);
00670         
00671         // set perpsective
00672         gluLookAt(0.0, 1.75, 0.0, 
00673                       0.0, 1.75, -1,
00674                           0.0f,1.0f,0.0f);
00675         
00676         // settings for glut cylinders
00677         glu_cylinder = gluNewQuadric();
00678     gluQuadricTexture(glu_cylinder, GL_TRUE );
00679 
00680         // set the world co-ordinates (used to set quadrants for bounding boxes)
00681         cam.SetWorldCoordinates(36000.0, 43200.0);
00682         // turn collision detection on
00683         cam.SetCollisionDetectionOn(true);
00684         // set number of bounding boxes required
00685         cam.SetNoBoundingBoxes(31); //KM 16/9/2016 increased from 19
00686         // set starting position of user
00687         //cam.Position(32720.0, 9536.0, 4800.0, 180.0);
00688 
00689         cam.Position(32720.0, 10450,27300, 90.0); //Temp starting position for easy access bug fixing
00690 
00691         //cam.Position(35000.0, 12000, 26100, 90.0); //Temp starting position at top of stairs for easy access bug fixing
00692 
00693         
00694         CreatePlains(); 
00695         
00696 
00697         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, light_ambient);
00698         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse);
00699         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, light_specular);
00700         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00701         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, sun_colour);
00702 
00703         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00704         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00705 
00706         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00707         // creates bounding boxes and places in array
00708         CreateBoundingBoxes();
00709         // copies bounding boxes from array to linked lists (one fopr each quadrant)
00710         cam.InitiateBoundingBoxes();
00711         
00712         // load texture images and create display lists
00713         CreateTextureList();
00714         CreateTextures();
00715 
00716         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00717         ambientspace = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/ambient_space.wav"));
00718         firstSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/greeting.wav")); 
00719         releaseBall = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/tennisserve.wav"));
00720         doorSlide = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/close_door.wav"));
00721         goal[0] = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/goal1.wav"));
00722         goal[1] = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/goal2.wav"));
00723         goal[2] = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/goal3.wav"));
00724         goal[3] = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/goal4.wav"));
00725 
00726         //populate LeaderBoard
00727         uil.getLeaderBoard();
00728 }

00842         DrawBalls();
00843         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); // mm
00844

00846         if (!(gVar.paused))

00848                 UpdateBalls();
00849         }
00850         if (gVar.paused != Paused)
00851         {
00852                 if (Paused)
00853                 {
00854                         RotSpeed = tempSpeed;
00855                 }
00856                 else
00857                 {
00858                         tempSpeed = RotSpeed;
00859                         RotSpeed = 0;
00860                 }

00879         uih.setDist(distToGoal);

00882                 TeleportToPlanets();
00883         }
00884         //after everything else so it draws on top - KJM 13/10/2016
00885         if (gVar.uiHUD) {
00886                 uih.displayUIHUD(tp.GetTexture(251));
00887         }
00888         if (gVar.uiMenu) {
00889                 gVar.paused = true;
00890                 uim.displayUIMenu(tp.GetTexture(252));
00891         }
00892         if (gVar.uiOptions) {
00893                 gVar.paused = true;
00894                 uio.displayUIOptions(tp.GetTexture(253));
00895         }
00896         if (gVar.uiLeaderBoard) {
00897                 gVar.paused = true;
00898                 uil.displayUILeaderBoard(tp.GetTexture(254));
00899         }
00900         if (gVar.uiInstruct) {
00901                 uih.displayInstruct(tp.GetTexture(263));
00902         }
00903         if (gVar.uiScore) {
00904                 uis.displayUIScore(tp.GetTexture(264), gVar.endScore);
00905         }
00906 
00907         if (!(gVar.uiMenu) && !(gVar.uiOptions) && !(gVar.uiLeaderBoard) &&!(gVar.uiInstruct))
00908                 gVar.paused = false;
00909 
00910         // clear buffers
00911         glFlush();
00912         glutSwapBuffers();
00913 }

00996 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00997 void reshape(int w, int h)
00998 {
00999         width = w;
01000         height = h;
01001 
01002         //update ui objects
01003         uih.updateUIHIDMembers(w, h);
01004         uim.updateUIMenuMembers(w, h);
01005         uio.updateUIOptionsMembers(w, h);
01006         uil.updateUILeaderBoardMembers(w, h);
01007         uis.updateUIScoreMembers(w, h);
01008 
01009         // Prevent a divide by zero, when window is too short
01010         // (you cant make a window of zero width).
01011         if (h == 0) h = 1;
01012         ratio = 1.0f * w / h;
01013 
01014         // Reset the coordinate system before modifying
01015         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
01016         glLoadIdentity();
01017         glViewport(0, 0, w, h);
01018         gluPerspective(45,ratio,1,400000);      
01019         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
01020 }

01294                         RotSpeed += RotSpeedAlt;
01295                 }
01296                 break;
01297 
01298         case 'A':
01299         case 'a':
01300                 if (!(gVar.paused))
01301                 cam.DirectionRotateLR(-moveSpeed);
01302                 break;
01303 
01304         case 'D':
01305         case 'd':
01306                 if (!(gVar.paused))
01307                 cam.DirectionRotateLR(moveSpeed);
01308                 break;
01309 
01310         case 'W':
01311         case 'w':
01312                 if (!(gVar.paused))
01313                 cam.DirectionFB(moveSpeed);
01314                 break;
01315 
01316         case 'S':
01317         case 's':
01318                 if (!(gVar.paused))
01319                 cam.DirectionFB(-moveSpeed);
01320                 break;
01321 
01322         case 'O':
01323         case 'o':
01324                 if (gVar.paused) gVar.paused = false; else gVar.paused = true;
01325                 cout << "Player x: " << cam.GetLR() << " y: " << cam.GetUD() << " z: " << cam.GetFB() << endl;
01326                 cout << "Goal x: " << GoalLoc[GoalLocI][0] << " y: " << GoalLoc[GoalLocI][1] << " z: " << GoalLoc[GoalLocI][2] << endl;
01327                 break;
01328         case 'I':
01329         case 'i':
01330                 if (gVar.uiHUD) {
01331                         if (gVar.uiInstruct) {
01332                                 gVar.uiInstruct = false;
01333                                 gVar.paused = false;
01334                         }
01335                         else {
01336                                 gVar.uiInstruct = true;
01337                                 gVar.paused = true;
01338                         }
01339                 }
01340         }
01341 }
01342 
01343 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01344 void releaseKeys(unsigned char key, int x, int y)
01345 {
01346         switch (key)
01347         {
01349                 //case 'x' :
01350                 //case 'X' :
01351                 //case 'z' :
01352                 //case 'Z' :
01353                 //      cam.DirectionLR(0);
01354                 //break;
01356                 //case 'a' :
01357                 //case 'A' :
01358                 //case 'q' :
01359                 //case 'Q' :
01360                 //      cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01361                 //break;
01362                 // step left or right
01363                 case 'x':
01364                 case 'X':
01365                 case 'z':
01366                 case 'Z':
01367                         cam.DirectionLR(0);
01368                         break;
01369                         // look left up or down
01370                 case 'f':
01371                 case 'F':
01372                 case 'r':
01373                 case 'R':
01374                         cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01375                         break;
01376                         // rotate left or right
01377                 case 'A':
01378                 case 'a':
01379                 case 'D':
01380                 case 'd':
01381                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01382                         break;
01383                         // move backwards or forwards
01384                 case 'W':
01385                 case 'w':
01386                 case 'S':
01387                 case 's':
01388                         cam.DirectionFB(0);
01389                         break;
01390         }
01391 }

01393 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01394 //  Mouse Buttons
01395 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01396 void Mouse(int button, int state, int x, int y)
01397 {
01398         if (!uiMouseHandler(button, state, x, y, uih, uim, uio, uil, uis) || gVar.DisplayExit) //filter for UI - KJM 18/10/2016 except for exit
01399         {
01400                 // exit tour if clicked on exit splash screen
01401                 if ((button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON) && (state == GLUT_DOWN))
01402                 {
01403                         if ((gVar.DisplayExit) && (x <= width / 2.0 + 256.0) && (x >= width / 2.0 - 256.0)
01404                                 && (y <= height / 2.0 + 256.0) && (y >= height / 2.0 - 256.0))
01405                         {
01406                                 DeleteImageFromMemory(image);
01407                                 uil.setLeaderBoard(); //write leaderboard to file to save for next time.
01408                                 exit(1);
01409                         }
01410                 }
01411         }
01412 }
01413 
01414 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01415 //  Mouse Movements (NOT USED)
01416 //  Can be used to rotate around screen using mouse, but keyboard used instead
01417 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01418 void mouseMove(int x, int y)
01419 {
01420                 if (x < 0)
01421                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01422                 else if (x > width)
01423                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01424                 else if (x > width/2.0)
01425                 {
01426                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(1);
01427                         Display();
01428                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01429                 }
01430                 else if (x < width/2.0)
01431                 {
01432                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(-1);
01433                         Display();
01434                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01435                 }
01436                 else
01437                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01438                 if (y < 0 || y > height)
01439                         cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01440 
01441                 else if (y > height/2.0) {
01442                         cam.DirectionLookUD(-1);
01443                         Display();
01444                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01445                 }
01446                 else if (y < height/2.0) {
01447                         cam.DirectionLookUD(1);
01448                         Display();
01449                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01450                 }
01451                 else
01452                         cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01453 }

02588 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02589 //  Called from the main display function to draw the backdrop (all images)
02590 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02591 void DrawBackdrop()
02592 {
02593         DisplayAboveWindowBlock ();
02594         DisplayBench ();
02595         DisplayBricks ();
02596         DisplayChancPosts ();
02597         DisplayCylinders ();
02598         DisplayDoorPaving ();
02599         DisplayDoorPosts ();
02600         DisplayEntranceSteps ();
02601         DisplayExtras ();
02602         DisplayGrass ();
02603         DisplayLargerTextures ();
02604         DisplayLibraryPosts ();
02605         DisplayMainPosts ();
02606         DisplayPavement ();
02607         DisplayPhysSciPosts ();
02608         DisplayPurplePosts ();
02609         DisplayRedPosts ();
02610         DisplayRoof();
02611         DisplayStepBricks ();
02612         if (gVar.lightsOn) DisplayLights ();
02613 }

02616 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02617 // Display the chancellery windoe and door posts
02618 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02619 void DisplayChancPosts ()
02620 {
02621         // Windowposts Chanc (downstairs)
02622         step = 0.0;
02623         for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++)
02624         {
02625                 glPushMatrix();
02626                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02627                         if ((i != 1) && (i != 2) && (i != 10) && (i != 11))
02628                         {                       
02629                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_FRONT));
02630                                 glCallList(11);
02631                         }
02632                         if ((i != 1) && (i != 10))
02633                         {                       
02634                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_RIGHT));
02635                                 glCallList(12);
02636                         }
02637                         if ((i != 2) && (i != 11))
02638                         {
02639                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_LEFT));
02640                                 glCallList(13);
02641                         }
02642                                 
02643                 glPopMatrix();          
02644                 step += 960.0;
02645         }
02646 
02647         //  Windowledges Chanc (downstairs)
02648         step = 0.0;
02649         for (int i = 0; i < 11; i++)
02650         {
02651                 glPushMatrix();
02652                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02653                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_FRONT));
02654                         glCallList(14);
02655                 
02656                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_TOP));
02657                         glCallList(15);         
02658                 glPopMatrix();
02659                 if ((i == 0) || (i == 8)) step += 960.0;
02660                 step += 960.0;
02661         }
02662 
02663         // Windowposts & Ledges Chanc (upstairs)
02664         glPushMatrix();
02665         step = 0.0;
02666         glTranslatef(0.0, 1023.0, 0.0);
02667         for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++)
02668         {
02669                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02670                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_FRONT));
02671                 glCallList(11);
02672                         
02673                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_RIGHT));
02674                 glCallList(12);
02675         
02676                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_LEFT));
02677                 glCallList(13);
02678                 if (i != 13)
02679                 {
02680                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_FRONT));
02681                         glCallList(14);
02682                 
02683                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_TOP));
02684                         glCallList(15);
02685                 }
02686                 step =+ 960.0;
02687         }
02688         glPopMatrix();
02689 
02690         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOW_LEDGE_END_1));
02691         glCallList(235);
02692         glPushMatrix();
02693                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 7447.0);
02694                 glCallList(235);
02695         glPopMatrix();
02696         glPushMatrix();
02697                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1024.0, 0.0);
02698                 glCallList(235);
02699         glPopMatrix();
02700         glPushMatrix();
02701                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 5527);
02702                 glCallList(235);
02703         glPopMatrix();
02704         glPushMatrix();
02705                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 6551);
02706                 glCallList(235);
02707         glPopMatrix();
02708         glPushMatrix();
02709                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 8471);
02710                 glCallList(235);
02711         glPopMatrix();
02712         glPushMatrix();
02713                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1152.0, 19031.0);
02714                 glCallList(235);
02715         glPopMatrix();
02716 
02717         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOW_LEDGE_END_2));
02718         glCallList(236);
02719         glCallList(237);
02720         glPushMatrix();
02721                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -960.0);
02722                 glCallList(237);
02723         glPopMatrix();
02724         glPushMatrix();
02725                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -8640.0);
02726                 glCallList(237);
02727         glPopMatrix();
02728         glPushMatrix();
02729                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -9600.0);
02730                 glCallList(237);
02731         glPopMatrix();
02732 
02733         //glPushMatrix();
02734                 //glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, -9600.0);
02735                 //glCallList(237);
02736 //      glPopMatrix();
02737 
02738         // angled corner of window ledges
02739         glPushMatrix();
02740                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1024.0, 0.0);
02741                 glCallList(236);
02742         glPopMatrix();
02743         glPushMatrix();
02744                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 7383.0);
02745                 glCallList(236);
02746         glPopMatrix();
02747         glPushMatrix();
02748                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 5463);
02749                 glCallList(236);
02750         glPopMatrix();
02751         glPushMatrix();
02752                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 6551);
02753                 glCallList(236);
02754         glPopMatrix();
02755         glPushMatrix();
02756                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 8471);
02757                 glCallList(236);
02758         glPopMatrix();
02759         glPushMatrix();
02760                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1152.0, 19031.0);
02761                 glCallList(236);
02762         glPopMatrix();
02763 }
02764 
02765 void DrawChancPosts ()
02766 {
02767         // Front of Window Post Chanc
02768         tp.CreateDisplayList (YZ, 11, 1024.0, 128.0, 33848.0, 10237.0, 9505.0, 0.586, 0.7344);
02769         // Right side of Window Post Chanc
02770         tp.CreateDisplayList (XY,  12, 64.0, 1024.0, 33848.0, 10237.0, 9599, 0.7344, 0.585);
02771         // Left side of Window Post Chanc
02772         tp.CreateDisplayList (XY,  13, 64.0, 1024.0, 33848.0, 10237.0, 9505.0, 0.7344, 0.585);
02773 
02774         // Window ledges of Chanc
02775         tp.CreateDisplayList (YZ, 14, 32.0, 1024.0, 33808.0, 10192.0, 9552.0, 1.0, 0.9375); // front ledge
02776         glNewList(15, GL_COMPILE); 
02777                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
02778                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
02779                         glVertex3f(33808.0, 10224.0, 9552.0);
02780                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.9375);

03148 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03149 // Display Purple Posts by Guild Shop
03150 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03151 void DisplayPurplePosts ()
03152 {
03153         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PURPLE_POST));
03154         glCallList(29);
03155         glPushMatrix();
03156                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 4800.0);
03157                 glCallList(29);
03158         glPopMatrix();
03159         glCallList(30);
03160         glPushMatrix();
03161                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 960.0);
03162                 glCallList(30);
03163         glPopMatrix();
03164         glPushMatrix();
03165                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 2880.0);
03166                 glCallList(30);
03167         glPopMatrix();
03168 
03169         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PURPLE_POSTSIDE));
03170         glCallList(31);
03171                 glPushMatrix();
03172                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -112.0);
03173                         glCallList(31);
03174                 glPopMatrix();
03175 
03176         step = 865.0;
03177         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03178         {
03179                 glPushMatrix();
03180                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
03181                         glCallList(31);
03182                 glPopMatrix();
03183                 glPushMatrix();
03184                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 78.0);
03185                         glCallList(31);
03186                 glPopMatrix();
03187                 step += 960.0;
03188                 if (i == 1) step += 960.0;
03189         }
03190         glPushMatrix();
03191                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 4688.0);
03192                 glCallList(31);
03193         glPopMatrix();
03194                 glCallList(32);
03195 }

04133 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04134 // Display Roof
04135 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04136 void DisplayRoof()
04137 {
04138         // main roof planks
04139         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_PLANKS));
04140         for (int i = 250; i < 253; i++) glCallList(i);
04141         
04142         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_BEAM_1));
04143         // corner beams
04144         for (int i = 1; i < 6; i ++) glCallList(i);
04145         step = -1689.0;
04146         for (int i = 0; i < 85; i++)
04147         {
04148                 glPushMatrix();
04149                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04150                         glCallList(253);
04151                 glPopMatrix();
04152                 step += 386.0;
04153         }
04154         glPushMatrix();
04155                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -2005.0);
04156                 glCallList(253);
04157         glPopMatrix();
04158         glCallList(254);
04159 
04160         step = 214.0;
04161         for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
04162         {
04163                 glPushMatrix();
04164                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04165                         glCallList(254);
04166                 glPopMatrix();
04167                 step += 386.0;
04168         }
04169 
04170         glPushMatrix();
04171                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 3216.0);
04172                 glCallList(254);
04173         glPopMatrix();
04174 
04175         // Beams between library and phys sci
04176         step = 0.0;
04177         for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
04178         {
04179                 glPushMatrix();
04180                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04181                         glCallList(298);
04182                 glPopMatrix();
04183                 step += 386.0;
04184         }
04185 
04186         glPushMatrix();
04187                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -99.0);
04188                 glCallList(298);
04189         glPopMatrix();
04190         glPushMatrix();
04191                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 1798.0);
04192                 glCallList(298);
04193         glPopMatrix();
04194 
04195         // Library Roof
04196         step = 281.0;
04197         for (int i = 0; i < 70; i++)
04198         {
04199                 glPushMatrix();
04200                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0);
04201                         glCallList(296);                
04202                 glPopMatrix();
04203                 step += 388.0;
04204         }
04205 
04206         // spacers
04207         for (int i = 202; i < 204; i ++) glCallList(i);
04208 
04209         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_BEAM_4));
04210         for (int i = 6; i < 11; i ++) 
04211         {
04212                 glCallList(i);
04213                 glPushMatrix();
04214                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 32.0);
04215                         glCallList(i);
04216                 glPopMatrix();
04217         }
04218 
04219         step = -1689.0;
04220         for (int i = 0; i < 85; i++)
04221         {
04222                 glPushMatrix();
04223                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04224                         glCallList(255);
04225                 glPopMatrix();
04226                 glPushMatrix();
04227                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 32.0);
04228                         glCallList(255);
04229                 glPopMatrix();
04230                 step += 386.0;
04231         }
04232 
04233         glPushMatrix();
04234                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -2005.0);
04235                 glCallList(255);
04236         glPopMatrix();
04237         glPushMatrix();
04238                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -1973.0);
04239                 glCallList(255);
04240         glPopMatrix();
04241 
04242         step = 214.0;
04243         for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
04244         {
04245                 glPushMatrix();
04246                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04247                         glCallList(256);
04248                 glPopMatrix();
04249                 glPushMatrix();
04250                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 32.0);
04251                         glCallList(256);
04252                 glPopMatrix();
04253                 step += 386.0;
04254         }
04255 
04256         glPushMatrix();
04257                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 3216.0);
04258                 glCallList(256);
04259         glPopMatrix();
04260         glPushMatrix();
04261                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 32.0);
04262                 glCallList(256);
04263         glPopMatrix();
04264 
04265         // Beams between library and phys sci
04266         step = 0.0;
04267         for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
04268         {
04269                 glPushMatrix();
04270                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
04271                         glCallList(299);
04272                 glPopMatrix();
04273                 glPushMatrix();
04274                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 32.0);
04275                         glCallList(299);
04276                 glPopMatrix();
04277                 step += 386.0;
04278         }
04279 
04280         glPushMatrix();
04281                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -67.0);
04282                 glCallList(299);
04283         glPopMatrix();
04284         glPushMatrix();
04285                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 1798.0);
04286                 glCallList(299);
04287         glPopMatrix();  
04288 
04289         // Library Roof
04290         step = 281.0;
04291         for (int i = 0; i < 70; i++)
04292         {
04293                 glPushMatrix();
04294                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0);
04295                         glCallList(297);                
04296                 glPopMatrix();
04297                 glPushMatrix();
04298                         glTranslatef(step + 32.0, 0.0, 0.0);
04299                         glCallList(297);
04300                 glPopMatrix();
04301                         
04302                 step += 388.0;
04303         }
04304         
04305         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_PLANKS_2));
04306         glCallList(257);
04307 
04308         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_BEAM_3));
04309         // corner beams
04310         for (int i = 170; i < 175; i ++) 
04311         {
04312                 glCallList(i + 5);
04313                 glPushMatrix();
04314                         glTranslatef(32.0, 0.0, 0.0);
04315                         glCallList(i + 5);
04316                 glPopMatrix();
04317         }
04318         glCallList(426);
04319         glCallList(427);
04320         glPushMatrix();
04321                 glTranslatef(0.0, 49.0, 3248.0);
04322                 glCallList(427);
04323         glPopMatrix();
04324         glPushMatrix();
04325                 glTranslatef(0.0, 49.0, 19031.0);
04326                 glCallList(427);
04327         glPopMatrix();
04328 
04329         // spacer top of chanc
04330         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_BEAM_3_TOP));
04331         glCallList(204);
04332         glCallList(205);
04333         glPushMatrix();
04334                 glTranslatef(64.0, 0.0, 0.0);
04335                 glCallList(205);
04336         glPopMatrix();
04337 
04338         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_BEAM_2));
04339         // spacers
04340         for (int i = 97; i < 101; i ++) glCallList(i);
04341         // corner beams
04342         for (int i = 170; i < 175; i ++) glCallList(i);
04343         
04344 
04345         // Top of Roof
04346         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_TOP));
04347         for (int i = 214; i < 216; i ++) glCallList(i);
04348         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ROOF_TOP_LIB));
04349                 glCallList(216);
04350 }

04581 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04582 //  Creates Angled Roof Beams
04583 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04584 void DrawAngledRoofBeam (int listNo, GLdouble x, GLdouble y, GLdouble z, GLdouble beamSize)
04585 {
04586         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
04587                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
04588                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
04589                         glVertex3f(x, y, z + 32.0);
04590                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
04591                         glVertex3f(x, y, z);
04592                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 1.0);
04593                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72, z);
04594                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 0.0);
04595                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72, z + 32.0);
04596                 glEnd();
04597         glEndList();
04598         glNewList(listNo + 5, GL_COMPILE);
04599                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
04600                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
04601                         glVertex3f(x, y, z);
04602                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
04603                         glVertex3f(x, y + 82.0, z);
04604                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 1.0);
04605                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72 + 82.0, z);
04606                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 0.0);
04607                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72, z);
04608                 glEnd();
04609         glEndList();
04610 }

04640 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04641 // Display Steps
04642 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04643 void DisplayEntranceSteps ()
04644 {
04645         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEP_PAVING_1));
04646         for (int i = 258; i < 274 ; i ++) glCallList(i);
04647         
04648         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEP_EDGE));
04649         for (int i = 274; i < 290 ; i ++) glCallList(i);
04650 
04651         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEP_PAVING_1));
04652         for (int i = 290; i < 293 ; i ++) glCallList(i);
04653 
04654         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEP_EDGE));
04655         for (int i = 293; i < 296 ; i ++) glCallList(i);
04656 
04657 
04658         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEPS_LIBRARY));
04659         step = 0.0;
04660         step2 = -51.0;
04661         for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
04662         {
04663                 glPushMatrix();
04664                         glTranslatef(step, step2, 0.0);
04665                         glCallList(206);
04666                 glPopMatrix();
04667                 glPushMatrix();
04668                         glTranslatef(step, step2, 965.0);
04669                         glCallList(206);
04670                 glPopMatrix();
04671                 step += 128.0;
04672                 step2 += -51.0;
04673         }
04674         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(STEPS_LIBRARY_TOP));
04675         glCallList(207);
04676                 glPushMatrix();
04677                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 965.0);
04678                         glCallList(207);
04679                 glPopMatrix();
04680 }

05779 //------------------PLANETS FUNCTIONS---------------------
05780 //Move planets to the position updated in OrbitPlanets
05781 void DisplayPlanets()
05782 {
05783         if (gVar.LevelNum > 0)
05784         {
05785                 //SUN
05786                 glPushMatrix();
05787                         glTranslatef(allPlanets[0][0], allPlanets[0][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[0][2] * SizeMult);
05788                         glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
05789                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_EMISSION, sun_colour);
05790                         glRotatef(rotAmt[0], 0, 1, 0);
05791                         glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
05792                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_SUN)); // MM - temp texture
05793                         gluSphere(quad, allPlanets[0][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20); // MM - changed to glusphere for texturing
05794                 glPopMatrix();
05795 
05796                 //Mercury
05797                 glPushMatrix();
05798                         glTranslatef(allPlanets[1][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[1][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[1][2] * SizeMult);
05799                         glRotatef(rotAmt[1], 0, 1, 0);
05800                         glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
05801                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission);
05802                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_MERCURY)); //MM - temp texture
05803                         gluSphere(quad, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[1][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05804                 glPopMatrix();
05805 
05806                 //Venus
05807                 glPushMatrix();

05919 
05920 //Calculate new position each planet will be moved to 
05921 void OrbitPlanets()
05922 {
05923         GLdouble x, z;
05924 
05925         rotAmt[0] += RotationSpeed[0] * (RotSpeed * 10);
05926         for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++)
05927         {
05928                 x = (allPlanets[i + 1][2] * sin(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed)) + (allPlanets[i + 1][0] * cos(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed));
05929                 z = (allPlanets[i + 1][2] * cos(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed)) - (allPlanets[i + 1][0] * sin(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed));
05930 
05931                 allPlanets[i + 1][0] = x;
05932                 allPlanets[i + 1][2] = z;
05933 
05934                 rotAmt[i + 1] += RotationSpeed[i + 1] * (RotSpeed * 10);
05935         }
05936 }
05937 
05938 void CheckLocationForTeleport()
05939 {
05940         if (cam.GetLR() > TeleportToX - 500 && cam.GetLR() < TeleportToX + 500 && cam.GetUD() > TeleportToY - 500 && cam.GetUD() < TeleportToY + 500 && cam.GetFB() > TeleportToZ - 500 && cam.GetFB() < TeleportToZ + 500)
05941         {
05942                 TeleportToPlanets();
05943         }
05944 
05945         if (cam.GetLR() > TeleportFromX - 500 && cam.GetLR() < TeleportFromX + 500 && cam.GetUD() > TeleportFromY - 500 && cam.GetUD() < TeleportFromY + 500 && cam.GetFB() > TeleportFromZ - 500 && cam.GetFB() < TeleportFromZ + 500)
05946         {
05947                 TeleportToBushCourt();
05948         }
05949 }
05950 
05951 
05952 void TeleportToPlanets()
05953 {
05954         //change location of goal
05955         if (GoalLocI < MaxGoals-1)
05956                 GoalLocI++;
05957         else
05958                 GoalLocI = 0;
05959 
05960         moveSpeed = 8;
05961         gVar.LevelNum = 3;
05962         RotSpeed = 0.01;
05963         current_balls = 0;
05964         uih.setBallCount(current_balls);
05965         gVar.uiHUD = InSpace = true;
05966         gVar.uiInstruct = true;
05967         gVar.paused = true;
05968         glClearColor(0, 0, 0, 1.0);
05969         cam.Position(SunX, allPlanets[0][1], cam.GetFB(), 0);
05970         uih.resetClock();
05971         uih.setZeroClock(true);
05972 
05973         ambientspace->Play();
05974         firstSound->Play();
05975 }
05976 void TeleportToBushCourt()
05977 {
05978         gVar.uiHUD = InSpace = false;
05979         moveSpeed = 3;
05980         glClearColor(97.0 / 255.0, 140.0 / 255.0, 185.0 / 255.0, 1.0);
05981         cam.Position(36110, 11918, 26197, 270);  
05982         ambientspace->Stop();
05983 }

05986 void DrawGoal()
05987 {
05988         glPushMatrix();
05989                 if (GoalCounter < (GoalNum + 1) * 30)
05990                         GoalCounter++;
05991                 else
05992                 {
05993                         GoalNum++;
05994                 }
05995 
05996                 if (GoalNum > 2)
05997                 {
05998                         GoalCounter = 0;
05999                         GoalNum = 0;
06000                 }
06001                 glTranslatef(GoalLoc[GoalLocI][0], GoalLoc[GoalLocI][1], GoalLoc[GoalLocI][2]);
06002 
06003                 //front
06004                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(GoalImgs[GoalNum]));
06005                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06006                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06007                 glVertex3f(0,0,0);
06008                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06009                 glVertex3f(0,-GoalSize,0);
06010                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06011                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, -GoalSize, 0);
06012                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06013                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, 0, 0);
06014                 glEnd();
06015                 //back
06016                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(GoalImgs[GoalNum]));
06017                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06018                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06019                 glVertex3f(0, 0, -GoalSize);
06020                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06021                 glVertex3f(0, -GoalSize, -GoalSize);
06022                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06023                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, -GoalSize, -GoalSize);
06024                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06025                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, 0, -GoalSize);
06026                 glEnd();
06027                 //left
06028                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(GoalImgs[GoalNum]));
06029                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06030                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06031                 glVertex3f(0, 0, -GoalSize);
06032                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06033                 glVertex3f(0, -GoalSize, -GoalSize);
06034                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06035                 glVertex3f(0, -GoalSize, 0);
06036                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06037                 glVertex3f(0, 0, 0);
06038                 glEnd();
06039                 //right
06040                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(GoalImgs[GoalNum]));
06041                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06042                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06043                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, 0, -GoalSize);
06044                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06045                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, -GoalSize, -GoalSize);
06046                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06047                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, -GoalSize, 0);
06048                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06049                 glVertex3f(GoalSize, 0, 0);
06050                 glEnd();
06051         glPopMatrix();
06052 }

06054 //-------------Ball Functions-------------
06055 void addParticle(float m, float r, float vx, float vy, float vz)
06056 {
06057         struct Ball p;
06058         r = r * 3;
06059         p.x = cam.GetLR();
06060         p.y = cam.GetUD() - r;
06061         p.z = cam.GetFB();
06062 
06063         p.vx = vx / 30; // /30 in case it is a speed particle,
06064         p.vy = vy / 30; // slow down the speed a little
06065         p.vz = vz / 30;
06066 
06067         p.m = m;
06068         p.r = r;
06069         p.speed = 50000000;
06070 
06071         p.color[0] = 1;
06072         p.color[1] = 0;
06073         p.color[2] = 0;
06074 
06075         p.visible = true;
06076 
06077         Balls[current_balls] = p;
06078         current_balls++;
06079         uih.setBallCount(current_balls);
06080         uih.setTotalBallCount(current_balls);
06081 }
06082 
06083 void DrawBalls()
06084 {
06085         int visibleBalls = 0;
06086         for (int i = 0; i < current_balls; i++)
06087         {
06088                 struct Ball *p = &Balls[i];
06089                 if (p->visible)
06090                 {
06091                         visibleBalls++;
06092                         glPushMatrix();
06093 
06094                         glTranslatef(p->x, p->y, p->z);
06095                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission);
06096                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_PLUTO));
06097                         gluSphere(quad, p->r, 20, 20);
06098 
06099                         glPopMatrix();
06100                 }
06101         }
06102         uih.setBallCount(visibleBalls);
06103 }
06104 
06105 void UpdateBalls()
06106 {
06107         if (!(Paused))
06108         {
06109                 for (int i = 0; i < current_balls; i++)
06110                 {
06111                         struct Ball *p;
06112                         p = &Balls[i];
06113 
06114                         if (p->visible)//Has not been destroyed
06115                         {
06116                                 for (int j = 0; j < gVar.LevelNum + 1; j++)
06117                                 {
06118                                         float d;
06119                                         if (j == 0)//Determines distance of the ball from each planets and the Sun. Sun has different equation from other planets
06120                                         {
06121                                                 d = sqrt(((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x)*((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x) + (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y)*(allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) + (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z)*(allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z));
06122                                         }
06123                                         else
06124                                         {
06125                                                 d = sqrt(((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x)*((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x) + (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y)*(allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) + (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z)*(allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z));
06126                                         }
06127 
06128                                         if (d > (allPlanets[j][3] * SizeMult) + p->r)//If not within the bounds of the planets, update the location of the ball based on the distance from the planets
06129                                         {
06130                                                 if (j == 0)
06131                                                         p->vx += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * ((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x) / d; //f = ma => a = f/m
06132                                                 else
06133                                                         p->vx += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * ((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x) / d; //f = ma => a = f/m
06134 
06135                                                 p->vy += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) / d;
06136                                                 p->vz += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z) / d;
06137 
06138                                                 p->x += p->vx;
06139                                                 p->y += p->vy;
06140                                                 p->z += p->vz;
06141                                         }
06142                                         else//Removes ball from play
06143                                         {
06144                                                 p->visible = false;
06145                                                 uih.hitPlanet();
06146                                         }                                       
06147                                 }
06148                                 //Checking if ball has hit goal. If it is hit, reset space and play a sound.
06149                                 if (p->x > GoalLoc[GoalLocI][0] - GoalSize/2 && p->x < GoalLoc[GoalLocI][0] + GoalSize/2 && p->y + GoalSize/2 > GoalLoc[GoalLocI][1] - GoalSize/2 && p->y + GoalSize/2 < GoalLoc[GoalLocI][1] + GoalSize/2 && p->z >  GoalLoc[GoalLocI][2] - GoalSize/2 && p->z < GoalLoc[GoalLocI][2] + GoalSize/2)
06150                                 {
06151                                         srand(time(0));
06152                                         GoalNumAud = rand() % MaxGoalsAud - 1;
06153                                         goal[GoalNumAud]->Play();
06154                                         p->visible = false;
06155                                         
06156                                         //pause game while all things finalising
06157                                         gVar.paused = true;
06158 
06159                                         //need to wait somehow while initials are put in
06160                                         
06161                                         //calculate score
06162                                         gVar.endScore = uih.genScore();
06163                                         cout << "score is calculated to " << gVar.endScore << endl;
06164                                         //display uiScore to enter intials
06165                                         gVar.uiScore = true;
06166                                         string endInitials = uis.getInitials();
06167                                                                                 
06168                                         cout << "initials are " << endInitials << endl;
06169 
06170                                         //stringify date
06171                                         time_t now = time(0);
06172                                         tm *ltm = localtime(&now);
06173                                         string thisday = to_string(ltm->tm_mday);
06174                                         string thismonth = to_string(ltm->tm_mon + 1);
06175                                         string thisyear = to_string(ltm->tm_year + 1900);
06176                                         string thisdate;
06177                                         thisdate.append(thisday);
06178                                         thisdate.append("/");
06179                                         thisdate.append(thismonth);
06180                                         thisdate.append("/");
06181                                         thisdate.append(thisyear);
06182 
06183                                         //send strings of initials and score and date to uiLeaderBoard
06184                                         uil.addLeaderBoard(endInitials, thisdate, gVar.endScore);
06185                                         
06186                                         TeleportToPlanets();
06187                                 }
06188                         }
06189                 }
06190         }
06191 }

06713 
06714 void DrawCorridorSteps(int stepH, int stepD, int stepW, int stepStartX, int stepStartY, int stepStartZ, int count)
06715 {
06716         // our steps
06717         for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
06718         {
06719                 //top of steps
06720                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PS_STEP_FRONT)); 
06721                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06722                         glColor3f(0, 1, 0);
06723                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06724                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06725                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06726                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + (i * stepH), stepStartZ-stepW);
06727                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06728                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ-stepW);
06729                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06730                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06731                 glEnd();
06732         }
06733         for (int i = 0; i < count-1; i++)
06734         {
06735                 // front of steps
06736                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PS_STEP_TOP));
06737                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06738                         glColor3f(1, 0, 1);
06739                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06740                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06741                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06742                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ - stepW);
06743                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06744                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - stepD - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ - stepW);
06745                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06746                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - stepD - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06747                 glEnd();                
06748         }
06749 }
06750 
06751 void DrawSlidingDoor()
06752 {
06753         glPushMatrix();
06754                 glTranslatef(0, 0, DoorZVar);
06755                 //front face
06756                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PS_DOOR_OUTSIDE));
06757                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06758                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06759                         glVertex3f(34270, 10900, 26750);
06760                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);

06808 
06809 int countSlides = 1; //to get it to only play once
06810 
06811 void OpenSlidingDoor()
06812 {
06813         //if door starting to open or starting to close play sound
06814         if (DoorZVar == MaxDoorZVar-DoorSpeed || DoorZVar == DoorSpeed) {
06815                 countSlides++;
06816                 if(countSlides % 2 == 0)
06817                         doorSlide->Play();
06818         }
06819         
06820 
06821         if (cam.GetLR() > DoorLoc[0] - 1500 && cam.GetLR() < DoorLoc[0] + 1500 && cam.GetUD() > DoorLoc[1] - 500 && cam.GetUD() < DoorLoc[1] + 500 && cam.GetFB() > DoorLoc[2] - 500 && cam.GetFB() < DoorLoc[2] + 500)
06822         {
06823                 if (DoorZVar < MaxDoorZVar)
06824                 {
06825                         DoorZVar += DoorSpeed;
06826                 }
06827         }
06828         else
06829         {
06830                 if (DoorZVar > 0)
06831                 {
06832                         DoorZVar -= DoorSpeed;
06833                 }
06834         }
06835 }

06840 void DisplayLights ()
06841 {
06842         // Light Fitting
06843         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT));
06844         GLdouble beamstep = 0.0;
06845         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)

06850                         glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06851                         glCallList(376);
06852                 glPopMatrix();
06853 
06854                 glPushMatrix();
06855                         glTranslatef(32905.0, 11265.0, 11134.0 + beamstep);
06856                         glRotatef( 90.0, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
06857                         glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06858                         glCallList(376);
06859                 glPopMatrix();
06860 
06861                 glPushMatrix();
06862                         glTranslatef(32905.0, 11330.0, 11134.0 + beamstep);
06863                          glRotatef( 90.0, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
06864                          glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06865                         glCallList(376);
06866                 glPopMatrix();
06867                 beamstep += 8492.0;
06868         }
06869         
06870         // Light Supports
06871         beamstep = 0.0;
06872         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
06873         {
06874                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT_SUPPORT_2));
06875                 step = -40.0;
06876                 for (int k = 0; k < 2; k++)
06877                 {
06878                         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
06879                         {
06880                                 glPushMatrix();
06881                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0 + beamstep);
06882                                         glCallList(377);
06883                                 glPopMatrix();
06884                                 glPushMatrix();
06885                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, -40.0 + beamstep);
06886                                         glCallList(377);
06887                                 glPopMatrix();
06888                                 step += 8.0;
06889                         }
06890                         step += 64.0;
06891                 }
06892 
06893                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT_SUPPORT));
06894                 step = -40.0;
06895                 for (int k = 0; k < 2; k++)
06896                 {
06897                         step2 = 0.0;
06898                         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
06899                         {
06900                                 glPushMatrix();
06901                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0 + step2 + beamstep);
06902                                         glCallList(378);
06903                                 glPopMatrix();
06904                                 glPushMatrix();
06905                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, -40.0 + step2 + beamstep);
06906                                         glCallList(378);
06907                                 glPopMatrix();
06908                                 step2 += 8.0;
06909                         }
06910                         step += 80.0;
06911                 }
06912                 beamstep += 8492.0;
06913         }

07179 
07180 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
07181 //  Increments frame count used for setting movement speed
07182 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
07183 void IncrementFrameCount()
07184 {
07185         double t = ((GLdouble)(clock()-lastClock))/(GLdouble)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;  
07186         frameCount ++;
07187 
07188         // reset after t
07189         if (t > 0.1)
07190         {
07191                 stepIncrement = t/frameCount * 1400;
07192                 angleIncrement = t/frameCount;
07193                 frameCount = 0;
07194                 lastClock = clock();
07195         }
07196 }
